media:group.media:title: Motion in Polar Coordinates (Example Exercise)
media:group.media:description:
In this video we're going to solve a little example exercise of an object moving along a trajectory which is given in polar coordinates.

Prerequisites:
- Kinematics in 1D, 2D and 3D
- Curves in 3D
- 2D Coordinate Systems
- Vector Projection

Lecture notes:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1tCHtZJqaO2UwzF2D30nXj5-pX8-M48ng/view?usp=sharing
